title: Lol wont open
body: when I click the icon to open lol its just shows the lol logo then gos away and does nothing please help tried to run in admin mode didn't work soo yea

replies.body:
Here are a few fixes I found on the internet :)

- Your Active Scripting may be disabled. Go to
Internet Options -> Security -> Active scripting (near the bottom) -> Enable -> OK.
Restart the launcher.

- If that didn't work;
Go to your projects folder (...\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects) and delete the lol_air_client and lol_launcher folders, then restart your patcher.

- You could try turning off UAC. If your a Windows user (apparently mac is different): Start -> Control Panel -> Search UAC -> Click on the mini bar and drag it all the way to the bottom -> Restart Computer.

Copied and pasted from http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=16770202#post16770202 (With a few changes)

Goodluck on fixing this !
- James {{champion:17}}
Do you get any error messages when doing this, or does it just disappear? What OS are you on?
